input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: EDF SA. Summary: Providing Training In The Risk Prevention Of Incivility, Violence And Aggression.. Description: The purpose of this purchase concerns support and professionalization services for the prevention of risks linked to work in relation to the public at Enedis Units: Services of training in Risk Prevention, Incivility, Violence and Aggression. This framework contract will have a duration of 8 years, including 5 firm years. EDF SA issues this contract notice in its name and on behalf of ENEDIS. Support and professionalization for the prevention of risks related to working in relation to the public within the Units of Enedis Enedis is the operator in charge of the public service mission of electricity distribution on behalf of all suppliers. This mission is carried out by 38,000 employees. The activities are carried out across the entire territory of metropolitan France. The organization is divided into business units (establishments within the meaning of the labor code). In addition to the support functions (DIR2S) and the national functions of Enedis, the organization has 25 regional directorates responsible for the operation of the electricity network (25 DR). The employees of the latter are the most exposed to the risks related to activities in relation with the public. Despite the preventive measures implemented, Enedis employees may be, as part of their daily missions, confronted with acts of incivility, violence, or aggression. These training courses aim to strengthen travel safety, adopt preventive and eco-responsible behavior, and improve the quality of service provided to the authorities. They will also update agents' knowledge of traffic rules, stress management and driving in special conditions (emergency, convoy, bad weather, heavy traffic). input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: OCCITANIE REGION. Summary: Animation of Collective Workshop Cycles for Audiences at the Maison De L'orientation in Montpellier. Description: The contract is likely to be renewed under the conditions of the specifications. Services are paid by fixed prices. Animation of collective workshop cycles for audiences at the Montpellier Orientation Center with the aim of orientation or reorientation professionalism of the people monitored. The Maison de l'Orientation wishes to offer, as it has done since its opening, an original system for facilitating collective workshops allowing a mix of audiences (from the student who has dropped out, to the job seeker, including the employee in search for retraining). The objective is to work on desires, potential, bring out skills, cross perspectives, encourage mutual aid. The challenge of this journey is to allow a large audience to rediscover meaning, method, confidence and network, to continue then their professional project (training, return to employment, business creation, etc.). Published Date: 2025-11-21. Closing Date: 2025-12-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: GRAND EAST REGION. Summary: Regional Continuing Professional Training Program for Prisoners - 2026. Description: Law 2004-809 of August 13, 2004 gives authority to the Regions to define and implement the regional vocational training policy for young people and adults looking for work. This competence was reaffirmed by the law of March 5, 2014 which extended its scope of application to people under the influence of justice, to French people living abroad, to the base of professional knowledge and skills and to the coordination of the Regional Public Orientation Service. In order to respond to this skill, the Grand Est Region has chosen to build its training offer from a cross-fertilization between employment and skills needs identified within the framework of consultations carried out with professional branches and the State, and diagnostics, carried out on the territory of the Maisons de la Region and with local stakeholders, in order to identify locally, as well as on a national scale. Grand Est, the most adequate and operational training response. The regional training offer thus constructed is offered in the form of public contracts to which training organizations can apply. Training actions aimed at detainees must meet the needs of businesses, but they are also part of an approach to combating recidivism. Also, the training actions implemented in the prison environment must allow people under the jurisdiction of justice to begin a professionalizing training course or which.... Published Date: 2025-11-06. Closing Date: 2025-12-01. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: GRAND EST REGION. Summary: Regional Continuing Professional Training Program for Prisoners - 2026. Description: Law 2004-809 of August 13, 2004 gives authority to the Regions to define and implement the regional vocational training policy for young people and adults looking for work. This competence was reaffirmed by the law of March 5, 2014 which extended its scope of application to people under the influence of justice, to French people living abroad, to the base of professional knowledge and skills and to the coordination of the Regional Public Orientation Service. In order to respond to this skill, the Grand Est Region has chosen to build its training offer from a cross-fertilization between employment and skills needs identified within the framework of consultations carried out with professional branches and the State, and diagnostics, carried out on the territory of the Maisons de la Region and with local stakeholders, in order to identify locally, as well as on a national scale. Grand Est, the most adequate and operational training response. The regional training offer thus constructed is offered in the form of public contracts to which training organizations can apply. Training actions aimed at detainees must meet the needs of businesses, but they are also part of an approach to combating recidivism. Also, the training actions implemented in the prison environment must allow people under the jurisdiction of justice to begin a professionalizing training course or which.... Its duration is 12 days for participants. Promotions are made up of the administration Metropolitan following a call for candidates and selection phase (cover letter, CV, professional project). The main aims of this route dedicated to proximity management are: -to enhance managers in their profession, -to better equip them, -to allow them to acquire to New skills, - to open a breathing and exchange space to them, - to develop a real mutual aid community of local managers

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: EPTB LEZ. Summary: Awareness of Risk Flooding with Schoolchildren in the Lez Watershed. Description: The awareness program "Water in Mediterranean climate between rarity and abundance" explains to children the natural mechanisms of flood formation, the notion of the watershed and connect the floods of Lez and the Mosson to significant rainfall. It develops culture Flood risk with in particular the gestures that can save in the event of a flood. But after this abundance, water can also become rare. Children are therefore made aware of the fragility of water resources and gestures to save them, but also to protect them from pollution.<br> This Program is offered to all schools in the perimeter of the EPTB Lez.<br> The objective for school years 2025 to 2028 is to raise awareness of 110 classes per year (85 elementary classes of CM1 and CM2 and 25 college classes of 6th and 5th) on the basis of three half-days animations.<br> Awareness of risk flooding with schoolchildren in the Lez watershed<br> The awareness program "Water in Mediterranean climate between rarity and abundance" explains to children the natural mechanisms for the formation of floods, the notion of the watershed And to connect the floods of the Lez and the Mosson to the significant rainfall. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: CROUS DE PARIS. Summary: the Contract Relates to the Following Services: Workshop Transition Food for Students Implementation of Food Transitioning Workshops for Students P. Description: This project is both a social project as it aims to create conviviality between the students, to transmit a healthy eating way to them, and balanced for a modest sum. It is also a cultural project leading to the discovery of local, seasonal and terroir products but also Better knowledge of food transition subjects. It will be more particularly emphasized on vegetable and durable cuisine, the valuation of the seasonality of fruits and vegetables. Objectives: - Adopting a more vegetable and balanced diet allows the WHO to reduce Many diseases - Fighting precariousness by making everyone a more diverse diverse at low prices - promoting group experiences makes it possible to simplify the placement of new food habits - to raise awareness of ecological, ethical and of food health to allow an acceleration of the process of vegetating meals served in our university restaurants considering that by better understanding the issues, practices can evolve. Published Date: 2025-07-18. Closing Date: 2025-08-25. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: GIP CARIF OREF (976). Summary: Spinning, Evaluation and Certifying Training Clea Interreg 2025. Description: The subject of this market is the selection of one or more providers for carrying out training actions whose objectives are as follows the objective 1 of this market is to focus training on the development of skills linked to the 7 basic areas of skills (S3CP) Clea Classic contextualized construction professions. The objective of training being the acquisition of skills and the validation of the Clea Classic certification. For the learner, the training provided must allow him: to validate Clea certification; To cross a higher level in the course Level 2 to 3 training; - to continue its job access path by acquiring a qualification to acquire a job The objective 2 of this market is to experience a 100% distant training action on the 3 targeted territories of the Mayotte, Reunion and Madagascar project. The training action must take place on the Mayotte e-training online training platform. Objective 3 of this market is to allow these job seekers an immersion internship in a professional environment during an exchange with another territory and thus allow them to create themselves A professional network in the 3 territories.. Published Date: 2025-06-30. Closing Date: 2025-07-31. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

For the learner, the training provided must allow him: to validate Clea certification; To cross a higher level in the course Level 2 to 3 training; - to continue its job access path by acquiring a qualification to acquire a job The objective 2 of this market is to experience a 100% distant training action on the 3 targeted territories of the Mayotte, Reunion and Madagascar project. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: FRANCE OCCITANIA WORK. Summary: Implementation of European Programs Erasmus+ by France Occitanie Work Allowing Priority Public Job Seekers to Benefit from Mobility Experience in an Eu Country.. Description: Implementation of European programs Erasmus+, adult education (EDA) by France Occitanie work allowing job seekers "priority public" to be able to benefit from an experience of mobility in another country of the U.E in order to re -mobilize this priority audience, to give them The impulse necessary for the emergence of a professional project and to help them position themselves on a process of professional reintegration. The placement in discovery and observation internship abroad aims exclusively to promote the return to employment and/or to develop the employability of beneficiaries of this program. Linguistic training cannot be the purpose of the assembly of these actions alone. This Erasmus+ EDA program includes 2 types of activities: Group mobility for adult learners and long -term individual mobility of adult learners . For group mobility, the duration is set at fourteen (14) days and two days of travel, a total of 16 days. For individual mobility, the duration is thirty (30) to (90) ninety days to which are added two days of travel. Trainees are likely to be positioned in different European countries.. Published Date: 2025-06-28. Closing Date: 2025-07-07. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Implementation of European Programs Erasmus+ by France Occitanie Work Allowing Priority Public Job Seekers to Benefit from Mobility Experience in an Eu Country.
output.Description: Implementation of European programs Erasmus+, adult education (EDA) by France Occitanie work allowing job seekers "priority public" to be able to benefit from an experience of mobility in another country of the U.E in order to re -mobilize this priority audience, to give them The impulse necessary for the emergence of a professional project and to help them position themselves on a process of professional reintegration. The placement in discovery and observation internship abroad aims exclusively to promote the return to employment and/or to develop the employability of beneficiaries of this program. Linguistic training cannot be the purpose of the assembly of these actions alone. This Erasmus+ EDA program includes 2 types of activities: Group mobility for adult learners and long -term individual mobility of adult learners . For group mobility, the duration is set at fourteen (14) days and two days of travel, a total of 16 days. For individual mobility, the duration is thirty (30) to (90) ninety days to which are added two days of travel. Trainees are likely to be positioned in different European countries.

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DEPARTMENT OF PUY-DE-DOME. Summary: "Professional Risk Prevention" Training. Description: The purpose of this consultation aims to train agents of the Puy-de-Dome department on various themes relating to the prevention of professional risks and the quality of life at work in accordance with the regulatory obligation of the employer.<br> These training courses potentially aim for 2,500 community agents.<br> Objectives expected of the training actions provided:<br> -Master of know-how and know-how of training programs.<br> -Master of internal procedures in the Puy-de-Dome department, which must imperatively be integrated into training<br> - Objective of Results for the agents concerned by qualifying training (e.g. electrical authorizations, caces, aipr, etc.)<br> The training of prevention actors<br> Road risks<br> Temporary site signaling<br> Risks related to gear driving<br> Nearby intervention authorization Networks (AIPR)<br> Electric authorizations<br> Risks related to height work<br> Fire risk<br> Mental health first aid (PSSM)<br> Certibiocide<br> Labor rescuers (SST)<br> Doc Title: "Professional risks" training "<br> Type contract: services. Published Date: 2025-06-27. Closing Date: 2025-09-08. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: MUNICIPALITY OF RIS ORANGIS. Summary: Animation Services for Sociolinguistic Workshops for the Needs of the Town of Ris-Orangis (91130). Description: The objective of the workshop is to promote the acquisition and consolidation of linguistic skills aimed at the autonomy of the public in daily and professional life. The workshops, organized during the day and in the evening, are intended for the inhabitants of the city in linguistic difficulty, Holders and not holders of a Republican Integration Contract (CIR), aged 18 to 65. The orientation of users is carried out by Ris Employment. Without mini and with maximum of 2,000,000 Euro (s) HT over 36 months. The services will probably extend from September 1 to July 31 of each year. The contract begins from its notification date. Published Date: 2025-06-26. Closing Date: 2025-07-15. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Summary: Compulsory Training and Training to Strengthen Approved Maternal Assistants from the Hautes -Alpes Department - Relaunch Lot 1 -. Description: MINIMUM minimum amount for the total duration of the contract: 19950.0 euro (s) H.T. The amount of 98,000.00 Euro (s) excl. This market is an integral part of an already allotated market, entitled compulsory training and strengthening training Approved maternal assistants of the Hautes-Alpes department, published on 10/11/2023 on the following platforms: Play, Boamp and the buyer profile. Lot 1, entitled Training for level 1 civic first aid gestures, was declared unsuccessful during the initial procedure, the Offers received having been deemed non -compliant and therefore irregular. Consequently, it was decided to relaunch this lot as part of an open suitable procedure. The framework agreement will be executed by the emission of purchase orders. The services are paid by unit prices. Theoretical training Initial, post-accurate, strengthening and training in first aid gestures. The status of maternal assistants has been reformed by the law of June 27, 2005 and its implementing texts strengthen the requirements of approval as well as compulsory training, with a view to professionalization of the profession. Decree n 2018-903 of October 23, 2018 relating to the training and renewal of approval of maternal assistants, which came into force on January 1, 2019, modified the objectives, the content, the methods of implementation and the distribution of times of .... instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: OCCITANIA REGION. Summary: Continuous Professional Training Services for Mainly Job Seekers as Part of the Occitanie Regional Training Plan. Description: In accordance with article L.6121-1 of the Labor Code, the Region is responsible for the regional policy of access to vocational training of young people and adults looking for a job or a new professional orientation.<br> As such, the region wishes, through the regional plan Training 2027-2030 (PRF27), buying continuous professional training services mainly payable from job seekers.<br> The PRF27 is structured in 3 large training components:<br> - preparatory training that allows the most distant audiences to build a professional project and prepare for qualification and/or access to employment<br> - qualifying training leading to a recognized diploma in order to facilitate access to a job<br> - innovative and experimental actions in order to support specific needs.<br> Current devices are specified on https://www.laregion.fr/-la-formation-professional; They are likely to evolve within the framework of the PRF27.<br> The consultations will be launched, by device, in the form of an adapted procedure open according to articles L2123-1 and R2123-1-3 of the public procurement code.<br> The market will be allotted And concluded in the form of a framework agreement with maximum command orders assigning or multi-attributive, if necessary, according to lots, in application of articles L2125-1 1 , R2162-1 to R2162-6, R2163 and R21-62-4 of the public procurement code. It will give rise to the show of vouchers .... Published Date: 2025-06-20. Closing Date: 2025-08-04. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Continuous Professional Training Services for Mainly Job Seekers as Part of the Occitanie Regional Training Plan

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: METROPOLIS OF LYON. Summary: Purchase of Training Services at the Heavy Group's Driver's License (Transport of Goods). Description: This training is intended for all agents of the Metropolis of Lyon whose missions are linked to the road area and who must hold a driving license from one of the categories of the heavy group to exercise their missions.<br> This training allows them to acquire skills, technical, regulatory, professional and preventive enabled them to drive:<br> - a vehicle assigned to the transport of goods or equipment whose total authorized load weight (PTAC) is greater than 3.5 tonnes (C),<br> - a heavy goods vehicle of more than 3.5 tonnes harnessed with a trailer whose PTAC is greater than 750 kg (CE license)<br> - a vehicle assigned to transport goods or equipment whose total authorized load weight (PTAC) is between 3.5 and 7.5 tonnes (C1 permit)<br> - a heavy goods vehicle whose PTAC is between 3.5 and 7.5 tonnes harnessed with a trailer of More than 750kg (C1E license).<br> The beneficiary delegations are: DTEE, DGR and DGEEP, in particular within the framework of the garbage/driver course.<br> The average is around 10 driving licenses per year over the past 5 years<br> Purchase of training services at the heavy group's driver's license (transport goods)<br> This training is intended for all agents of the Metropolis of Lyon whose missions are linked to the road area and who must hold a driving license from one of the categories of the heavy group to exercise their missions.<br> This training per.... Published Date: 2025-06-19. Closing Date: 2025-08-11. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SEMMARIS. Summary: Concession of Service Relating to the Exploitation, Management and Development of the Rungis Academy Training Center. Description: The purpose of the contract is to entrust to a dealer, exclusive to the exploitation, management and development of the Rungis Academy training center. The concessionaire must: design, organize and provide training intended to develop the skills and employability oflearners in the businesses of the food, logistics and distribution sector. The Rungis Academie is a vocational training center located at the heart of the international Rungis market, the world's leading world market for fresh products. An area of ​​3,000 m2, it was designed to accommodateUp to 500 learners per year, with the aim of meeting growing skills in skilled labor throughout the food, logistical and distribution chain. The dealer will pay: = a fixed fee under the concession, = an additional feeIn % of the business volume achieved, packaged at a minimum of annual turnover. These fees will be the subject of a proposal by the candidate.. Published Date: 2025-05-13. Closing Date: 2025-06-20. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed
